properties.entry: SELECT * FROM SYS_PORTAL SP WHERE SP.CODE = #portalCode#

SELECT STM.ID, STM.PORTAL_CODE PORTALCODE, STM.PLUGIN_CODE PLUGINCODE, CONCAT(SPP.URL, (CASE WHEN SP.URL IS NULL THEN STM.URL ELSE SP.URL END)) URL, STM.TITLE, STM.TARGET, STM."ORDER", STM.PARENT_ID PID, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_SITE_MAP T1, SYS_SITE_MAP T2 WHERE T1.ID = T2.PARENT_ID AND T1.ID = STM.ID) CHILD_COUNT, STM.THUMBNAIL_SMALL THUMBNAILSMALL , STM.THUMBNAIL_MIDDLE THUMBNAILMIDDLE, STM.THUMBNAIL_LARGE THUMBNAILLARGE FROM SYS_SITE_MAP STM LEFT OUTER JOIN SEC_PERMISSION SP ON STM.URL = SP.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SEC_PERMISSION SPP ON SP.PARENT = SPP.ID WHERE PORTAL_CODE = #portalCode# ORDER BY STM."ORDER"
SELECT * FROM SYS_SHORTCUT_KEY SSK WHERE SSK.PORTAL_CODE = #portalCode# ORDER BY SSK.DISPLAY_ORDER
SELECT NVL(MAX(SSM."ORDER"), 0) FROM SYS_SITE_MAP SSM WHERE SSM.PORTAL_CODE = #portalCode# AND SSM.PARENT_ID = #parentId#
UPDATE SYS_SITE_MAP SSM SET SSM.PARENT_ID = #parentId#, SSM."ORDER" = #order# WHERE SSM.ID = #menuId#
